title: Tutankoopa

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Lock Inside**: During the day, lock a target in your pyramid, Jailing them during the night.
- **Issue Order**: Have your Chain Chomp execute the player in your pyramid, the target will ignore restrictions and automatically use any abilities they have to protect themselves or prevent you.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- For each day you are not the factional attacker, your attack value increases by a tier, it drops to Basic after you execute someone.
- You may just attack someone with a Basic attack if you are the Factional attacker.
- You may anonymously talk with your prisoner.
- Jailed players cannot be targeted by any direct ability, and cannot perform any action, unless they are a Koopa teammate.

desc:
Post 4359
*"This is Tutankoopa. He's one of Bowser's followers. I've heard that he has sort of a pharaoh complex."*
